QuestData.Title: The Sword of Truth
QuestData.Description: Lord Ravencrest's army rises from the dead, but I believe they are controlled by Gul'dan's will.$B$BTake this - Lord Ravencrest's blade, Fal'shathil. It was known for a unique, magical quality. Those who gazed upon its mirrored blade found themselves unable to deny the truth.$B$BTake the blade and plant it in the ground. Attack the night elven ghosts near its light. Once they are weakened in its presence, perhaps they will regain their senses.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Fal'shathil on the ground, then defeat Black Rook night elves within its holy light.

Objectives.Objective: Black Rook soldiers defeated near Fal'shathil
